languages.text: "Все как всегда. Пираты лютуют, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}ксеносы{/g} охотятся на одинокие суда, контрабандисты вершат свои гнусные делишки. Один лишь доблестный {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Имперский Флот{/g} с ними борется. И мы благодарим Бога-Императора, что находимся под его защитой!"

"Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"
languages.original_text: "Все как всегда. Пираты лютуют, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}ксеносы{/g} охотятся на одинокие суда, контрабандисты вершат свои гнусные делишки. Один лишь доблестный {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Имперский Флот{/g} с ними борется. И мы благодарим Бога-Императора, что находимся под его защитой!"

traits.locale_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, xenos preying on lone ships. The valiant Imperial Navy alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

"Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, xenos preying on lone ships. The valiant Imperial Navy alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

"Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

languages.text: "Es ist immer dieselbe alte Geschichte. Blutrünstige Piraten, verruchte Schmuggler, auf verlassenen Schiffen lauernde {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}Xenos{/g}. Allein die {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}imperiale Kriegsflotte{/g} bekämpft sie und wir danken dem Gottimperator, dass wir seinen Schutz genießen!"
languages.original_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist immer dieselbe alte Geschichte. Blutrünstige Piraten, verruchte Schmuggler, auf verlassenen Schiffen lauernde Xenos. Allein die imperiale Kriegsflotte bekämpft sie und wir danken dem Gottimperator, dass wir seinen Schutz genießen!"

"Es ist immer dieselbe alte Geschichte. Blutrünstige Piraten, verruchte Schmuggler, auf verlassenen Schiffen lauernde Xenos. Allein die imperiale Kriegsflotte bekämpft sie und wir danken dem Gottimperator, dass wir seinen Schutz genießen!"

languages.text: « Toujours la même rengaine. Pirates en maraude, contrebandiers sans foi ni loi, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xénos{/g} sanguinaires en quête de vaisseaux isolés... La valeureuse {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Marine impériale{/g} doit se battre sur tous les fronts, et nous rendons grâce à l'Empereur pour sa protection ! »
languages.original_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

traits.locale_text: « Toujours la même rengaine. Pirates en maraude, contrebandiers sans foi ni loi, xénos sanguinaires en quête de vaisseaux isolés... La valeureuse Marine impériale doit se battre sur tous les fronts, et nous rendons grâce à l'Empereur pour sa protection ! »

« Toujours la même rengaine. Pirates en maraude, contrebandiers sans foi ni loi, xénos sanguinaires en quête de vaisseaux isolés... La valeureuse Marine impériale doit se battre sur tous les fronts, et nous rendons grâce à l'Empereur pour sa protection ! »

languages.text: «Las historias de siempre. Piratas violentos, infames contrabandistas, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} que atacan naves aisladas. ¡La valerosa {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Armada Imperial{/g} combate todas estas amenazas, y damos gracias al Dios Emperador por disfrutar de Su protección!».
languages.original_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

traits.locale_text: «Las historias de siempre. Piratas violentos, infames contrabandistas, xenos que atacan naves aisladas. ¡La valerosa Armada Imperial combate todas estas amenazas, y damos gracias al Dios Emperador por disfrutar de Su protección!».

languages.text: 「昔ながら、変わってない。暴れまわる海賊、悪質な密輸業者、単独航行の船を食い物にする{g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}異種族{/g}。勇猛果敢な{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海軍{/g}のみがそいつらと戦い、我らはその庇護下にあることを神帝陛下に感謝している！」
languages.original_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

traits.locale_text: 「昔ながら、変わってない。暴れまわる海賊、悪質な密輸業者、単独航行の船を食い物にする異種族。勇猛果敢な帝国海軍のみがそいつらと戦い、我らはその庇護下にあることを神帝陛下に感謝している！」

languages.text: “老一套，都是些老一套，像是肆虐的海盗啊、邪恶的走私犯啊、袭击落单舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}异形{/g}啊，之类的。勇敢的{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海军{/g}一直在与这些家伙战斗，我们得感谢神皇庇护我们！”
languages.original_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"

traits.locale_text: “老一套，都是些老一套，像是肆虐的海盗啊、邪恶的走私犯啊、袭击落单舰船的异形啊，之类的。勇敢的帝国海军一直在与这些家伙战斗，我们得感谢神皇庇护我们！”
“老一套，都是些老一套，像是肆虐的海盗啊、邪恶的走私犯啊、袭击落单舰船的异形啊，之类的。勇敢的帝国海军一直在与这些家伙战斗，我们得感谢神皇庇护我们！”

languages.text: "Her zamanki şeyler. Kudurup duran korsanlar, menfur kaçakçılar, tek başına dolanan gemileri avlayan {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}zenolar{/g}... Korku nedir bilmeyen {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}İmparatorluk Donanması{/g}, hepsiyle tek başına savaşıyor. Bizler de korumaları altında olduğumuz için Tanrı İmparator'a şükürlerimizi sunuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Same old, same old. Rampaging pirates, nefarious smugglers, {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g} preying on lone ships. The valiant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} alone fights them all, and we thank the God-Emperor that we can enjoy its protection!"
